item.description:
Let’s Celebrate and Network!

Let's celebrate and network at the "Spring Fever Singles Dance AND Networking Extravaganza" on Friday, April 5th.

Time: 8:00PM – 1:00AM – Dancing, Mingling & Networking

Location: David’s Restaurant at 5151 Stars & Stripes Drive in Santa Clara. Free Parking!

Get Tickets: http://springsinglesdance.eventbrite.com/#

Enjoy music with DJ Rawk Hard and the dance cover band Mo-Fos which will keep you on the dance floor all night long!

DJ Rawk Hard will start the party playing all of your favorite hits from yesterday and today: Top 40′s, Classics, R & B, Disco, and Rock and Roll and more! Check out DJ Rawk Hard at: http://blip.tv/videodjmix.

Click the link to get tickets to this event: http://springsinglesdance.eventbrite.com/#

Cost:

$15 Dance Prepay Special (By April 5th at 4:00PM)

OR…

Our Super Special offer: Buy 2 prepaid Spring Fever dance tickets and receive the 3rd ticket for free!

OR…

$25 cash at the door

Enjoy the popular, dynamic and high energy dance cover band, Mo-Fos playing classic rock music from the 70′s, 80′s and 90′s. (www.mo-fos.com) 

  • Dressy attire suggested
  • Free light appetizers starting at 8:00PM (while they last!)

Click the link below to learn more about the event and to get tickets: http://www.partyclubentertainment.com/singles-parties/spring-fever-singles-dance-extravaganza-on-friday-april-5th/

Spring is in the air! Expect a great time with a fun and festive crowd! At our last event we had over 300 people! Space is limited to 350 people.

Get your ticket now to secure your admission > Click the Link Below:

http://springsinglesdance.eventbrite.com/#
item.how_to_find_us: From Hwy 101 take Great America Pkwy exit; Right on Tasman; Left on Centennial, Left on Stars & Stripes
item.name: Spring Fever Singles Dance and Business Networking Event!
